abstracts.cdata!:
The project will include: (a)
            reclamation of about 19,000 ha of land, now seriously
            affected by salinity, in six coastal valleys of the country;
            (b) rehabilitation and/or construction of main and secondary
            irrigation and drainage systems for about 33,000 ha in those
            valleys; (c) improvement of the operation and maintenance
            services in the whole irrigated area in the six valleys
            (about 68,300 ha); (d) improvement of agricultural
            supporting services; (e) preparation of feasibility studies
            for similar projects in other coastal valleys.
